A4.text: In 1977, Liverpool manager Bob Paisley paid a British transfer record of Â£440,000 to take Dalglish to Liverpool.

A5.text: Dalglish made his debut on 13 August 1977 in the season opener at Wembley, in the 1977 FA Charity Shield against Manchester United.
